## Body row {data-height=80}

### **What is R-Ladies?**

R-Ladies is an organization with the mission of promoting diversity in R Community via meetups and mentorships in a safe and friendly environment.

**R-Ladies Leadership Team:** 
<img src="img/leadership.png" style="width:90%"></img>

**R-Ladies Global Team:** 
<img src="img/team1.png" style="width:100%"></img>  

****

**R-Ladies Chapters**

We have 137 chapters in 44 countries:

- 42 chapters in the US
- 7 chapters in Canada
- 29 chapters in Latin America
- 40 chapters in Europe
- 5 chapters in Africa
- 6 chapters in Asia
- 7 chapters in Australia/Oceania
<img src="img/rladies-map.png" style="width:100%"></img>






### **R-Ladies Initiatives**

<a href="https://twitter.com/WeAreRLadies">**@WeAreRLadies**</a> - idealized/lead by Katherine Simeon
  <img src="img/we-are-rladies.png" style="width:100%"></img>
  
The R-Ladies RoCur (Rotating Curation) is a twitter handle that will feature an awesome R-Lady each week. 
This account is run by R-Ladies Global.
  
<!-- <img src="img/we-are-rladies.png" style="width:80%"></img> -->

****


<a href="https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLSck8FBjNWjziI8pPIoCBlf5J4oQ_6pzeUdbQ1HjYfJ2bNDwDw/viewform">**R-Ladies Abstract/Scholarship Review Request**</a> - lead by Jennifer Thompson <br>
  <img src="img/review2.png" style="width:80%"></img>

Feedback on various types of R-related abstracts, applications and diversity scholarships to encourage R-Ladies to apply for conference speaking slots and opportunites. 


### **R-Ladies Initiatives**

<a href="http://rladies-community-slack.herokuapp.com">**R-Ladies Community Slack** </a> - lead by Florencia D'Andrea, Melina Vidoni, Sina Rüeger, Yanina Bellini.
  <img src="img/slack.png" style="width:100%"></img>  

R-Ladies community Slack is a safe & global space to discuss topics and share ideas around #rstats & the #rladies community (for women and gender minorities).

****

<a href="https://twitter.com/rladies_iwd2018">**@rladies_iwd2018**</a> - idealized by Maëlle Salmon and lead by Maëlle Salmon, Bea Hernández, Kelly O’Briant, Page Piccinini, Sheila Saia <br>
  <img src="img/rladies_dir.png" style="width:100%"></img>
  
Internation Women Day celebrating with a fabulous feed of featured faces from the R-Ladies directory.



### **R-Ladies Initiatives**

#### R-Ladies Remote

- Coffee Chat

Informal and casual group chat about R, working remote, R-Ladies or anything that you'd like to be discussed.

- Reading Group

Reading and Discussion about a paper or article.
